Package geometries

Class Geometry

java.lang.Object
geometries.Intersectable
geometries.Geometry
Direct Known Subclasses:
Plane, Polygon, Sphere, Tube
public abstract class Geometry extends Intersectable
abstract class Geometry - represents any kind of 3D geometry
